shortDescription: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in vpn/js/gateway_login_form_view.js in Citrix NetScaler Gateway 11.0 before Build 66.11 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the NSC_TMAC cookie.
vulnerabilityName: Citrix netscaler_gateway_11.0 Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
